text.p: The annualised average yield on an issue of 252-day GKO discount Treasury bills (series 22078) was 36.55 percent at an auction on Wednesday, the Central Bank said.
Dealers had forecast the average yield would be 36.31-36.98 percent.
Series 22074 bills, maturing on December 10, 1997, the closest maturity date to the new issue, closed at 79.20, to yield 36.87 percent on Tuesday.
Full details of the auction follow:

On March 26 the Finance Ministry will offer five trillion roubles in an additional tranche of 448-day OFZ interest-bearing bonds (series 24010). It will also repay about 6.34 trillion roubles in maturing 217-day T-bills (series 22046).
